radiographic_examinations.findings: 3-4 cm tumor on the left kidney.
Multiple air-filled lung cysts and a granuloma within the right lung.
3 tumors on the right kidney treated with surgical enucleation; tumors measured 1.2 × 1.0 cm, 1.0 × 0.9 cm, and 2.5 × 2.0 cm.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Histologic examination showed oncocytic renal neoplasms.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Previous partial left nephrectomy, a 2-cm tumor, and multiple bilateral renal lesions less than 1 cm in diameter with some lesions demonstrating enhancement suggesting they were solid masses.
